    • setCdol

      public void setCdol(@NonNull byte[] cdol)
      Set the Card risk management Data Object List 1 (CDOL).
      Parameters:
      cdol - The CDOL byte array. The length of CDOL array must be smaller than 252.

    • setIpb

      public void setIpb(@NonNull byte[] ipb)
      Set the Issuer Proprietary Bitmap (IPB).
      Parameters:
      ipb - The IPB byte array.

    • setIaf

      public void setIaf(byte iaf)
      Set the Issuer Authentication Flags (IAF).

      The bits listed have the following meaning if set:

      • 8 (most significant) - Either the amount or the amount and currency are used.
      • 7 - PSN is included.
      • 6 - Include only the amount (bit 8 must be set).
      All other bits are reserved and must not be set.
      Parameters:
      iaf - The IAF byte.

    • setIad

      public void setIad(@NonNull byte[] iad)
      Set the Issuer Application Data (IAD).
      Parameters:
      iad - The IAD byte array.

    • setCid

      public void setCid(byte cid)
      Set the Cryptographic Identifier (CID).
      Parameters:
      cid - The CID byte.
